overview.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of an .
overview.param: An object that contains the event data.
overview.remarks: When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.

overview.summary: Provides data for the InfoMessage event. This class cannot be inherited.
overview.remarks: The InfoMessage event contains an collection with warnings messages sent from the Firebird Server.

property.name: Errors
property.summary: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the Firebird Server.
property.value: The collection of warnings sent from the Firebird Server.
